Author: Illogicalbiologist
Text: Think I’m too deep in, my new goal weight is literally just ‘down’, it’s the control freak nature.

Author: throwaway4206911711
Text: I hit my ugw 3 pounds ago and set another gw. In addition I also set a "limit" to how much more weight I'm "allowed" to loose. I'm working on weighing myself less and less. I wanted to throw my scale out when I got to my ugw because I knew if I stayed having it I would make another ugw and uk what I did lmao. If you can yeet your scale into the trash I would but if you honestly cant try and wean yourself off of it.
